thread.title: Talk it Out: Should Ohio schools stop suspending young students?
thread.title_full: Talk it Out: Should Ohio schools stop suspending young students?

author: Linda Kinsey, cleveland.com
title: Talk it Out: Should Ohio schools stop suspending young students?
text: Should Ohio schools stop suspending young students? One Ohio lawmaker thinks so and is planning to introduce legislation that would create a state ban on the practice. What do you think?
